title: Installation issue: nwchem
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install spack install nwchem ^/3knddk6 ^/pm5iu7q ^/ipf533j ^/xthsirs  # i can provide those deps, however i think they are not important
==> Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8' '64_to_32' 'NWCHEM_TOP=/shared/spack/var/spack/stage/nwchem-6.8.1-2b457puynn2wvujo43tzjlcmvhizpogf/nwchem-6.8.1' 'CC=gcc' 'FC=gfortran' 'USE_MPI=y' 'MPI_LOC=/shared/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora29-x86_64/gcc-8.2.0/openmpi-3.1.3-p32rso5r3fllle3ecinnm2agfhfsilrj' 'USE_PYTHONCONFIG=y' 'PYTHONVERSION=2.7' 'PYTHONHOME=/shared/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora29-x86_64/gcc-8.2.0/python-2.7.15-ipf533jhvbqv7xcc5bwznazy3jnimpxf' 'BLASOPT=-L/shared/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora29-x86_64/gcc-8.2.0/openblas-0.3.4-3knddk6xl4dita67qfjvclkwxl4btkpv/lib -lopenblas' 'BLAS_LIB=-L/shared/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora29-x86_64/gcc-8.2.0/openblas-0.3.4-3knddk6xl4dita67qfjvclkwxl4btkpv/lib -lopenblas' 'LAPACK_LIB=-L/shared/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora29-x86_64/gcc-8.2.0/openblas-0.3.4-3knddk6xl4dita67qfjvclkwxl4btkpv/lib -lopenblas' 'USE_SCALAPACK=y' 'SCALAPACK=-L/shared/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora29-x86_64/gcc-8.2.0/netlib-scalapack-2.0.2-vcanl3li5ykxwt3fhcd5tnpzdzhconc4/lib -lscalapack' 'NWCHEM_MODULES=all python' 'NWCHEM_LONG_PATHS=Y' 'USE_64TO32=y' 'BLAS_SIZE=4' 'LAPACK_SIZE=4' 'SCALAPACK_SIZE=4' 'NWCHEM_TARGET=LINUX64'

1 error found in build log:
     91    gcc  -g -o /shared/spack/var/spack/stage/nwchem-6.8.1-2b457puynn2wvujo43tzjlcmvhizpogf/nwchem-6.8.1/bin/LINUX64/depend.x depend.c
     92    /bin/rm -f depend.o
     93    make[2]: Leaving directory '/shared/spack/var/spack/stage/nwchem-6.8.1-2b457puynn2wvujo43tzjlcmvhizpogf/nwchem-6.8.1/src/config'
     94    /shared/spack/var/spack/stage/nwchem-6.8.1-2b457puynn2wvujo43tzjlcmvhizpogf/nwchem-6.8.1/bin/LINUX64/depend.x  -I/shared/spack/var/spack/stage/nwc
           hem-6.8.1-2b457puynn2wvujo43tzjlcmvhizpogf/nwchem-6.8.1/src/tools/install/include > dependencies
     95    /shared/spack/var/spack/stage/nwchem-6.8.1-2b457puynn2wvujo43tzjlcmvhizpogf/nwchem-6.8.1/src/config/64_to_32 bas_blas.F bas_blasP.F basis.F
     96    make[1]: /shared/spack/var/spack/stage/nwchem-6.8.1-2b457puynn2wvujo43tzjlcmvhizpogf/nwchem-6.8.1/src/config/64_to_32: Command not found
  >> 97    make[1]: *** [../config/makelib.h:275: 64_to_32] Error 127
     98    make[1]: Leaving directory '/shared/spack/var/spack/stage/nwchem-6.8.1-2b457puynn2wvujo43tzjlcmvhizpogf/nwchem-6.8.1/src/basis'
     99    make: *** [GNUmakefile:158: 64_to_32] Error 1

See build log for details:
  /shared/spack/var/spack/stage/nwchem-6.8.1-2b457puynn2wvujo43tzjlcmvhizpogf/nwchem-6.8.1/spack-build.out
```

### Platform and user environment

I looked into it and basically the script `nwchem-6.8.1/src/config/64_to_32` that make claimed it did not find, is present and it's first line is `#!/bin/csh`. I installed tcsh with dnf and now it seems to work (still compiling).
